text.section:
This subtitle does not apply to a dispensary or first aid treatment facility that is maintained only to provide services for:
Employees of a commercial or industrial plant;
Employees or students of an educational institution; or
Individuals in a convent, county home, motel, hotel, apartment, or facility, if the individuals are able to live independently.

This subtitle applies to the provision of home health care services by a hospital or related institution to 2 or more unrelated individuals, whether the services are provided directly or under contract with a home health agency.
